name: Treasure Hunt girl
description:
This is a game to find hidden objects, in this cartoon world, there are many hidden props in the world, you need to find a handful of them.

Game Features:
⚪ Lots of props, waiting for you to find
⚪ Cartoon world, dream start
⚪ collection wallpaper, beauty CG

Game play:
⚪ Basic operations WSAD Moves the role
⚪ Interactive operation E Open the door or collect items
⚪ SHIFT allows the character to run faster
